formula.name: enactingText
formula.p:
The Department of Finance
The Department of Finance and Personnel was renamed the Department of Finance by section 1(4) of, and Schedule 1 to, the Departments Act (Northern Ireland) 2016 (c.5 (N.I.)), with the concurrence of the Lady Chief Justice, makes the following Regulations in exercise of the powers conferred by sections 21 and 40 of the Legal Complaints and Regulation Act (Northern Ireland) 2016
2016 c.14 (N.I.):

content.p: These regulations may be cited as the Legal Complaints and Regulation Act (Northern Ireland) 2016 (Appeals) Regulations 2025 and shall come into operation on xxxx 2025.
In these regulations the 2016 Act means the Legal Complaints and Regulation Act (Northern Ireland) 2016.
An appeal, against a determination of the Bar Complaints Committee, may be made to the High Court where the determination contains a direction in accordance with section 19 of the 2016 Act.
Sealed with the Official Seal of the Department of Finance on xxxx.
